<br>

We are delighted to announce the next annual workshop of the joint working group “Adaptive Designs and Multiple Testing Procedures” of the German (DR) and the Austrian-Swiss (ROeS) Regions of the International Biometric Society (IBS).

**Where:** Regensburg, Germany (in-person only).

**When:** The workshop will run from 26th-27th February 2025.


**Short course:** There will be a pre-workshop short course on *Bayesian Adaptive Trials* from 24th-25th February 2025, see [**here**](https://admtp.github.io/ADMTP2025/course.html). 

**Abstract submission:** Abstract submissions are now closed.

**Registration:** Registration is now closed.

**Scientific and Organising Committee:** David Robertson (MRC Biostatistics Unit, University of Cambridge), Thomas Jaki (University of Regensburg and MRC Biostatistics Unit, University of Cambridge), Cornelia Kunz (Boehringer-Ingelheim), Marta Bofill Roig (Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya - BarcelonaTech).

**Contact:** If you have any questions about the workshop, please e-mail [David Robertson](mailto:david.robertson@mrc-bsu.cam.ac.uk).
